ComicInfo.Title: The Beanstalk; Cracked Interviews the Energy Conservation King; G.I. Donut Boys; Career Dreams That Came True; The Cracked Guide to Gymnastics; Test Tube Products of the Future; Christmas Cards; More Celebrity Nightmares; The Cracked History of the Automobile; If Mork Appeared in Other T.V. Shows and Movies
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.A large beanstalk leads a man up into the land of giants where he is sprayed with DDT.
A look at the nightmares of various celebrities (and Sylvester).
Mork enters 'Fantasy Island,' 'Hawaii 5-0,' 'Star Wars,' 'Family Feud' and 'Dracula.'
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:43:49. [Issue ID 250528]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Howard Nostrand, Don Orehek, Bill Ward, John Severin, Su Gumen, John Langton, Sam Whitehead, Warren Sattler
ComicInfo.Inker: Howard Nostrand, Don Orehek, Bill Ward, John Severin, Su Gumen, John Langton, Sam Whitehead, Warren Sattler
